content: I'd like to merge the code in #82397 to a branch of mine, and run perf evaluation on CI. However the branch for that PR was deleted by the author, and I can't see the commits (git show fails with "bad object") even after fetching their git repo. Is there a way to get the commits in that PR somehow?
You can use git fetch https://github.com/rust-lang/rust.git refs/pull/82397/head to fetch commits of that PR.
